text: The Favor is a 1994 romantic-comedy movie. It is about friendship betrayals and heartbreak. The Favor was shot in 1990, although not released until late April-early May in 1994. Elizabeth McGovern and Brad Pitt are part of the cast. The reviews of the movie were not good. Category:1994 romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Donald Petrie
title: The Favor
